trans-unit.source: Await {0} instead
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, espere o {0}
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated. {0} is a method name.

trans-unit.source: Use await instead
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use a espera
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously waiting on tasks or awaiters may cause deadlocks. Use await or JoinableTaskFactory.Run instead.
trans-unit.target: Esperar de forma síncrona por tarefas ou awaiters pode causar deadlocks. Em vez disso, use await ou JoinableTaskFactory.Run.
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid problematic synchronous waits
trans-unit.target: Evite esperas síncronas problemáticas

trans-unit.source: The type "{0}" should be used on main thread explicitly. Call {1}() or await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() first.
trans-unit.target: O serviço do Visual Studio "{0}" deve ser usado em um thread principal explicitamente. Chame ThreadHelper.ThrowIfNotOnUIThread() ou espere primeiro pelo JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync().
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
{0} is a type name and {1} is the name of a method that throws if not called from the main thread.

trans-unit.source: Invoke single-threaded types on Main thread
trans-unit.target: Use serviços do VS do thread de interface do usuário
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid "async void" methods, because any exceptions not handled by the method will crash the process.
trans-unit.target: Evite métodos "async void”, pois exceções que não são manipuladas pelo método causarão falha no processo.
trans-unit.note: "async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

trans-unit.source: Avoid async void methods
trans-unit.target: Evite métodos async void
trans-unit.note: "async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using async lambda for a void returning delegate type, because any exceptions not handled by the delegate will crash the process.
trans-unit.target: Evite usar o lambda async void para um tipo de delegado que é retornado nulo, pois todas as exceções que não são manipuladas pelo delegado causarão falha no processo.
trans-unit.note: "void" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid unsupported async delegates
trans-unit.target: Evite delegados assíncronos sem suporte

trans-unit.source: AsyncEventHandler delegates should be invoked via the extension method "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" defined in Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading assembly.
trans-unit.target: Os delegados do AsyncEventHandler devem ser invocados por meio do método de extensão "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" definido no assembly Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading.

trans-unit.source: Use InvokeAsync to raise async events
trans-unit.target: Use InvokeAsync para acionar eventos assíncronos

trans-unit.source: Calling await on a Task inside a JoinableTaskFactory.Run, when the task is initialized outside the delegate can cause potential deadlocks. You can avoid this problem by ensuring the task is initialized within the delegate or by using JoinableTask instead of Task.
trans-unit.target: Chamar await em uma Task em JoinableTaskFactory.Run, quando a tarefa for inicializada fora do delegado pode causar deadlocks em potencial. Você pode evitar esse problema assegurando que a tarefa seja inicializada no delegado ou usando JoinableTask em vez de Task.

trans-unit.source: Avoid awaiting non-joinable tasks in join contexts
trans-unit.target: Evite aguardar tarefas não unidas em contextos de junção

trans-unit.source: Lazy<Task<T>>.Value can deadlock. Use AsyncLazy<T> instead.
trans-unit.target: Lazy<Task<T>>. O valor pode apresentar deadlock. Em vez disso, use AsyncLazy<T>.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using Lazy<T> where T is a Task<T2>
trans-unit.target: Evite usar Lazy<T>, no qual T é uma Task<T2>

trans-unit.source: {0} synchronously blocks. Await {1} instead.
trans-unit.target: O {0} é bloqueado de forma síncrona. Em vez disso, espere o {1}.

trans-unit.source: {0} synchronously blocks. Use await instead.
trans-unit.target: O {0} é bloqueado de forma síncrona. Em vez disso, use await.

trans-unit.source: Call async methods when in an async method
trans-unit.target: Chame métodos assíncronos quando estiver em um método assíncrono

trans-unit.source: Limit use of synchronously blocking method calls such as JoinableTaskFactory.Run or Task.Result to public entrypoint members where you must be synchronous. Using it for internal members can needlessly add synchronous frames between asynchronous frames, leading to threadpool exhaustion.
trans-unit.target: Limite o uso bloqueando sincronicamente chamadas de método como JoinableTaskFactory.Run ou Task.Result para membros de ponto de entrada no qual você deve ser síncrono. Usar isso para membros internos pode adicionar sem necessidade estruturas síncronas entre estruturas assíncronas, levando à exaustão de pool de threads.

trans-unit.source: Implement internal logic asynchronously
trans-unit.target: Implementar a lógica interna de forma assíncrona

trans-unit.source: Rename to {0}
trans-unit.target: Renomear para {0}

trans-unit.source: Use "Async" suffix in names of Task-returning methods.
trans-unit.target: Use o sufixo "Async" em nomes de métodos que retornam tarefas.

trans-unit.source: Use "Async" suffix for async methods
trans-unit.target: Use o sufixo "Async" para métodos assíncronos

trans-unit.source: Change return type to Task
trans-unit.target: Alterar o tipo de retorno para Task
trans-unit.note: Task is a type name and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current. Use an overload that accepts a TaskScheduler and specify TaskScheduler.Default (or any other) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Evite sobrecargas de método que assumem TaskScheduler.Current. Use uma sobrecarga que aceita um TaskScheduler e especifique TaskScheduler.Default (ou qualquer outro) explicitamente.

trans-unit.source: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current
trans-unit.target: Evite sobrecargas de método que assumem TaskScheduler.Current

trans-unit.source: Provide an instance of JoinableTaskFactory in this call (or another overload) to avoid deadlocks with the main thread.
trans-unit.target: Forneça uma instância de JoinableTaskFactory nessa chamada (ou outra sobrecarga) para evitar deadlocks com o thread principal.

trans-unit.source: Provide JoinableTaskFactory where allowed
trans-unit.target: Fornecer o JoinableTaskFactory quando permitido

trans-unit.source: Expose an async version of this method that does not synchronously block. Then simplify this method to call that async method within a JoinableTaskFactory.Run delegate.
trans-unit.target: Exporte uma versão assíncrona desse método que não bloqueia de forma síncrona. Em seguida, simplifique esse método para chamar esse método assíncrono em um delegado JoinableTaskFactory.Run.

trans-unit.source: Offer async methods
trans-unit.target: Oferecer métodos assíncronos

trans-unit.source: Await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() to switch to the UI thread instead of APIs that can deadlock or require specifying a priority.
trans-unit.target: Espere que o JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() mude o thread da interface do usuário em vez das APIs que podem realizar deadlock ou requerer a especificação de uma prioridade.

trans-unit.source: Avoid legacy thread switching APIs
trans-unit.target: Evitar APIs de troca de treads herdadas
trans-unit.note: thread switching APIs refers to Visual Studio SDK or .NET methods that can be used to switch threads, but are obsolete and should be avoided.

trans-unit.source: Missing await operator for "using" expression.
trans-unit.target: Operador await ausente para a expressão “using”
trans-unit.note: "await" and "using" are C# keywords and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Await Task within using expression
trans-unit.target: Await Task em uma expressão using
trans-unit.note: "await Task" is a C# compound term, and "using" is a C# keyword. These should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Await using expression
trans-unit.target: Expressão await using
trans-unit.note: "await" and "using" are C# keywords and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Use await instead
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use a espera
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Thread affinity checks should be unconditional.
trans-unit.target: Thread affinity checks should be unconditional.

trans-unit.source: Assert thread affinity unconditionally
trans-unit.target: Assert thread affinity unconditionally

trans-unit.source: The type "{0}" should be used on main thread explicitly. Await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() first.
trans-unit.target: The type "{0}" should be used on main thread explicitly. Await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() first.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a type name and {1} is the name of a method that throws if not called from the main thread.
